variables.description: The customer gateway's Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Autonomous System Number (ASN).
variables.name: BgpAsn
variables.type: Number BgpAsn is always an integer value.

variables.description: The internet-routable IP address for the customer gateway's outside interface. The address must be                static.
variables.name: IpAddress

variables.description: The tags that you want to attach to the resource.
variables.name: Tags

variables.description: The type of VPN connection that this customer gateway supports.
variables.name: Type
